titleStmt.title: The affinitie of the faithfull being a verie godlie and fruitfull sermon, made vpon part of the eight chapter of the Gospel of Saint Luke. By Henrie Smith.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Henry, 1550?-1591.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by VVilliam Hoskins [, John Danter,] and Henrie Chettle, for Nicholas Ling, and Iohn Busbie,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A."; the last leaf is blank.
A variant of the edition with John Danter's name, and lacking Henry Chettle's, in the imprint.
Reproduction of an original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (since deaccessioned).
